about_the_game:
For generations, the High Mountain has preserved its reputation as one shrouded in mystery. Its origin remains unknown, its interiors remain unseen. The dreadful sierra holds many secrets bound to be unraveled by one brave, or rather, reckless adventurer. Thou, come forth and let the world know of treasures that no eye has ever set its sight on before. Exploration is nigh.



High Mountain Roller Coaster VR is a trip into the very depths of the unknown. Prepare to see a world like no other in one of the most immersive roller coaster experiences in Virtual Reality to date. The tracks will be your guide, embrace their path and they will reward your curious eyes.

FEATURES:


  • Diverse environments - the High Mountain may seem as a snowy, cold, and desolate destination at first, however, its setting drastically shifts into a completely different one the further you advance.

  • Powered by Unreal 4 - featuring UE4’s famous rendering system the High Mountain experience is the perfect opportunity to test out what Virtual Reality is truly capable of.

  • Full HTC Vive and Oculus support - designed and developed to enable the immersive experience to both headset owners.

You can always follow us on our social media for the latest updates.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Keyboard and mouse required
  • Additional Notes: Video Output: HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2 or newer; USB Port: 1x USB 2.0 or better port
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-3770 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 980 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Video Output: HDMI 1.4 or DisplayPort 1.2 or newer; USB Port: 1x USB 2.0 or greater port

short_description: Embark on a daring journey and discover the remains of a long-forgotten civilization nestled on top of the High Mountain. What tales have never been heard?
